column5: Hey Folks!  Hope everyone is doing well and catching plenty of fish! Been awhile since I posted on here...Anyway...  I'm planing on heading to Port Credit in the coming days - question, has anyone been down there yet? Just wondering if the fish are stacking up prepping to head up river or is it still too early?...I don't expect any "hot spots" (I frequent the place myself - or at least I used to, back when I lived in Mississauga).  PS: I'll be fishing from shore.  Thanks in Advance, A2F (Rob)
With all the rain we've had, I wouldn't be surprised if there's slim pickings at the mouth.
Its hit and miss right now, Sunday AM they were all stacked at the mouth then the wind and waves changed and they were gone.  Standing room only casting spoons.
Thanks for the help!  Hoping more can chime in - if not, this is enough info.  Thanks again!!
Fished the mouth last night 530 till 800, lots marked but no takers
With all this rain you better get out there to pick up the stragglers or else they'll be long gone.  Don't wait around for internet reports.
And here I was thinking this thread would be a report..  What a jip!!
